page.title: 06FREE TIME - TEENS TO ADULT
page.content: unique routine based on set moves which range from free flowing gymnastic twists and turns to jerky, robotic type movements. Prestige comes from performing a demanding routine or developing new moves. Anyone who just copies another's routine is shunned by the circle. Once people marry, leisure time activities, especially expensive ones, are curtailed until families are growing up. Many women said looking after their families and homes was a full time job and left little time for leisure. Time is spent on D.I.Y. projects in the home, and visits to local pubs or clubs in the evening. Television, fishing and watching football and rugby provide weekend entertainment. Cost is a big barrier for many people in Wyke who would like to try more 'exciting' activities.
